option.name: template
option.value: public java.lang.String toString() { #if ( $members.size() == 0 ) return "${classname}[]"; #else #set ( $i = 0 ) return "${classname}[" + #foreach( $member in $members ) #if ( $i == 0 ) "## #else ", ## #end #if ( $member.objectArray ) $member.name=" + java.util.Arrays.toString($member.accessor) + #elseif ( $member.primitiveArray && $java_version >= 5) $member.name=" + java.util.Arrays.toString($member.accessor) + #elseif ( $member.string ) $member.name='" + $member.accessor + "'" + #else $member.name=" + $member.accessor + #end #set ( $i = $i + 1 ) #end ']'; #end }
